title: How do I use the dynamic albums?
answer: Access Gallery, switch to the photo mode, and touch Dynamic albums. Select the photos you want to add to the album and touch the start button. To change the background music, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140388). When you are done, touch the check mark (âˆš) in the upper right corner to save your settings.
